meta.name: description
meta.value: General purpose dialog for rendering AddMediaIntent success cases

parameter.name: isDestinationPlaylist
parameter.description: True means will add to a playlist, otherwise add to library.

parameter.name: playlistTitle
parameter.description: The title of the playlist to add to.

parameter.name: useDialogMemoryForAppAttribution
parameter.description: should app attribution use dialog memory

parameter.name: device
parameter.description: This still needs support from SKPlatform.
